title: 2020 Snake River 10' Equipment Trailer with Ramps
item_description:
2020 Snake River 10' Equipment Trailer with Ramps

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2020
  • Make: Snake River
  • VIN: 5PTBF1028L1034340
  • Model: FB5X10-7K HD
  • VIN: 5PTBF1028L1034340
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 7000lb
  • Trailer Type: Equipment

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 206”
  • Overall Width: 88”
  • Overall Height: Ramp Travel Height: 82” Height To Wheel Wells: 31” Height To Deck: 19”
  • Deck Length: 120”
  • Deck Width: 60”
  • Width Between Fenders: 63”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Independent Trailing Arm
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: ST22.5/75R15
  • Electric Plug Type: 4-Way Flat
  • Hitch: 2" Ball

Features

  • Features: Ramps

Ramp length: 68”

Note: State of South Carolina Certificate of Title. Seller purchased this item 6/7/2024 and did not transfer out of state title into their name, the new buyer will receive the following 1-2 weeks following removal: Certificate of South Carolina Title, and California Transfer Form. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transferring out-of-state title, applying for new plates, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
